Text.Value: Wait, I know you! You're the reason some of us got here in one piece. Thanks!
And in case you're thinking of trying to scam me out of my hard-earned loot, think again. I already sold it.
Pardon if my eyes are all saucer-like. I didn't realise Baldur's Gate was so big.
Stay away from trapped chests!
What do you think of Baldur's Gate?
Tell me these items aren't stolen from the goods donated to the refugees.
It's unnerving to see a city almost as large as a great forest.
Didn't you? Figured we only got the scraps you didn't have the strength to carry.
You looted Moonrise Towers?
Still - we got some decent stuff. Made a nice change from picking through your dusty pockets.
I heard you helped a refugee family stay in the home they found. Good for you! As a trader, I'm going to look for a place, too.
Heard Mol made it inside already. Figures she'd not only wiggle her way out of Moonrise, but also slip into the city ahead of the rest of us.
Wonderful, isn't it?
Wish I could tell you. We're stuck out here, but most of the action is beyond Wyrm's Crossing.
Would I try to fool a sharpy like you? Have a look!
Leave.
You did me a real favour clearing all those ghouls out of Moonrise.
That old bone-bag Ketheric had some fancy junk stashed behind all the cobwebs and piles of gore.
You can say that again... So many pockets to pick.
Dangerous? It's a goldmine. So many pockets to pick.
Leave.
Big and dangerous. Watch yourself, kid.
I prefer cities to forests - pull a con on a squirrel, and all you get is nuts.
Don't be a goose! They couldn't be - bloody Flaming Fists are guarding that barn like it was a bank.
But even if they were liberated from the barn, all profits go to the refugees anyway, so it's legit, right?
Hello again. Looking for something different? You've come to the right merchant!
Where are you from?
Elturel. It wasn't near as big as the Gate even before half of it burned up in the Hells.
And you're in luck, because we're having a special sale on some of the choice items I picked up on our way here. Fancy stuff. Wanna see?
Show me these 'fancy' items you have on offer. Anything magical?

Synopsis: Mattis expresses gratitude of having survived the harsh path behind.
